mapper.select: select b.bno, b.tno, b.mno, b.btitle, b.bcontent, date_format(b.breg_date, '%y.%m.%d') as bregDate, date_format(b.bmod_date, '%y.%m.%d') as bmodDate, b.bview_cnt as bviewCnt, m.mname as bwriter, (select count(*) from comment where bno = b.bno) as bcommentCnt from board as b left join member as m on b.mno = m.mno where b.bno = #{bno} and b.btype = #{btype}
select fno, bno, fori_name as foriName, freal_name as frealName, fpath, fthumb from fileattach where bno = #{bno} order by fno asc
